name: foodsoft-shop
description: Shopping cart component for Foodsoft: web-based software to manage a non-profit food coop.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && mkdir -p build/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/famfamfam-flags/dist/sprite/famfamfam-flags.min.css node_modules/famfamfam-flags/dist/sprite/famfamfam-flags.png build/css/ && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts build/ && sed 's/node_modules[^"]*\/\([^"]*\)"/css\/\1"/' index.html > build/index.html && [ -e local.js ] && cp local.js build/

author: wvengen <dev-voko@willem.engen.nl>
